title: Enhancing Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Smartphone-Based Sustainable Environmental Data Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Statistics and GIS Concepts Comprehension
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can collect and analyze regional environmental data using smartphone-based WebGIS tools
Learners can process geospatial data acquired in mobile environments mathematically to derive sustainability indicators
Learners can explain the procedures for statistically validating environmental data collected through citizen science platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
